page.title: 09SCHOOL PLAYGROUND GAMES-1
page.content: {MARBLES}- Marbles is a popular game. There are about 4 different varieties of games to play with marbles. One of them is where you throw marbles into a circle and try and knock your opponent's marbles out. Another game is where you roll your marble and put your feet round it and your opponent rolls their marble at yours. There are two games of this sort, keeps and friendlies. Another game is called Birds in a Bush where you and your opponent take turns in holding a number of marbles. One person has to guess how many marbles the other person has. If you are correct you win the marbles. If you are incorrect you give the opponent the number of marbles you were wrong. A marble is a round piece of glass with coloured paper or plastic inside. You can also get steel ones and crystal ones.
